description:
Single parameter value.
This is a union, which means that this structure can contain either one of the fields below.
The structure is prefixed with tag - a selector value that indicates which particular field is encoded.

variables.name: empty
variables.description: Empty field, used to represent an undefined value.

variables.name: realValue
variables.description: 32-bit type is used to simplify implementation on low-end systems

variables.name: booleanValue
variables.description: 8-bit value is used for alignment reasons

variables.name: stringValue
variables.description: Length prefix is exactly one byte long, which ensures proper alignment of payload
